transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. So with you she baat kar rahi hoon India mart head office se.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir aapka na ye Sri Satguru Industries ke naam se jo business list hai na isme ek ticket open hua hai wo hai aapka email bounce ka aap by lead bhi consume nahi kar pa rahe honge na uski vajah se to.
Customer: By lead to mil rahi hai lekin meri sales ki nahi mil rahi hai madam.
Executive: Main bhej dungi wo aapko aap ye batao by lead me kya kya dikkate aa rahi hai kyuki abhi abhi mere pass aapki profile aayi hai.
Customer: Quantity ki dikkat hai quantity meri jo main deal karta hu wo quantity ki aa hi nahi rahi hai lead.
Executive: To aapko kitni quantity me order chahiye sir ek hota hai dekho low ka aur ek medium ka ek high ka to jo low high quantity chahiye.
Customer: High quantity chahiye.
Executive: High quantity chahiye sir high quantity me na mere hisab se 70% customer aise hain jo pehle as a sample lena chahte hain matlab as a sample sample wali baat nahi aap to dal do jisko lagega wo quantity dalega.
Customer: Ha ha.
Executive: Lekin aapki 90% mere ko sample ke chakkar me mere ko lead aa hi nahi rahi hai proper.
Executive: Achcha aur kya dikkat aa rahi hai by lead me.
Customer: By lead me yahi dikkat aa rahi hai ki main main chhoti quantity me deal nahi karta wo 50 gram 100 gram 50 kilo ye sab deal hi nahi karta.
Executive: Gram wala nahi bhejungi ha sir gram wala to main se main sehmat hu main kaha aapki baat se gram wala nahi bhejungi aap isme kilogram bhi likhiye mere ko.
Customer: Kilogram bhi likhiye mere ko.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir term me chahiye na aapne mujhe bola high value hai to high me to term hi aata hai fir.
Customer: Ha ha term me chahiye mere ko.
Executive: Aur amount quantity aapke product ke hisab se rahegi fir usme sir main ye keh rahi hu ki aap na ek bar na by lead consume nahi kar paoge agar main bhejungi bhi to to aap na ek bar apni email id open karna theek hai aur email id na aapki matlab bounce ho rahi hai email bounce ka ek ticket open hua hai usme aap by lead consume nahi kar paoge jab tak aap wo mail inbox jo hai aapka usko aap tab tak khali nahi karoge matlab aapko jo aapki mail me faltu cheeze add on hai usme aayi hui hai jo aapke kaam ki nahi hai ek bar aap dekh ke usko matlab ya to aap draft kar sakte ho ya usko delete kar sakte ho dono option aapke pass waha pe honge.
Customer: Mail id change kar du to.
Executive: Nahi change karani hai to koi dikkat nahi hai uske liye mujhe ticket open karna padega aapke liye main ticket open kar dungi ye wala jo mail id hai aap usko hatana chahte ho na.
Customer: Ji ha.
Executive: Achcha to kaun sa wala mail id aap add karana chahte ho fir.
Customer: Sri Satguru Industries.
Executive: Main aapko na whatsapp pe bhejungi aap whatsapp pe mujhe likh ke matlab spelling mistake na ho jisse to waha pe bhi clear ho jayega aap mujhe wo bhej dena theek hai aur same jo firm ka naam hai na Sri Satguru Industries continue me.
Customer: Ha.
Customer: 2022@gmail.com.
Executive: Ek minute aapka farm ka naam hai Sri Satguru Industries iske baad.
Customer: 2022.
Executive: 22@gmail.com.
Customer: Ha ye mail id dal dijiye isme bounce nahi hogi.
Executive: Achcha theek hai aur sir fir bhi sir uske liye matlab mail id to chalo main change ke liye yaha pe dal hi deti hu par isme na aapko ek cheez aur karni padegi aapko mail id se na matlab jitni by lead aapne pehle ke time me consume ki hui hai one year me aapka mail id jo add hai main ek bar check kar leti hu alternate me bhi jata hai na sir hamare pass ki aap alternate me bhi option rehta hai email id add karane ka.
Customer: Are aap main wali yahi dal do na primary me.
Executive: Achcha primary me aap ye wale add karane chah rahe ho.
Customer: Ha ha secondary me wo dalna ho to aap dal do.
Executive: Ek minute rukiye main check kar leti hu ha theek hai theek hai ha mere pass aa gayi main ye wala primary me add kar deti hu dusra wali bhi.
Executive: Deti hu theek hai na aur inhone ek aur point of view likha hua hai aapke liye yaha pe mere pass likh ke aaya tha upar se mail ki aap jitni update wali jo receive kar rahe ho na messages the client have an ha alternative address to main usko change kar deti hu isme ticket open karne ke liye bhi aa gaya mere pass theek hai aur koi dikkat aa rahi hai sir by lead ko lekar.
Customer: Bahut dikkat hai quantity wali aa hi nahi rahi hai mere ko main kaise consume karu.
Executive: Quantity product sahi aa raha hai ya product ka bhi issue aa raha hai wrong product.
Customer: Product me bhi synthetic aata hai synthetic me bhi main deal nahi karta.
Executive: Achcha aapne jitne bhi map kiye hue hain mere according ha yaha pe overall hamare jo bhi map hai na ye eight product hai isme do hamare aise product hai jaise ki iron oxide karke hai ye hamara team category me map hai like matlab generic categories me map hai aap iski by lead consume karoge to aapke pass multiple tarike ki by lead aayengi isko team category se hata dungi fir uske baad specific jana flow me start ho jayengi mere pass secondary mapping nahi ho rakhi hai main secondary mapping bhi aapki karungi product ki kyuki eight product hai sare b usme ja rahe hain b rank me then a rank ko chahiye wo jyada achcha hota hai sir aapka whatsapp number yahi hai na.
Customer: Ha whatsapp number to yahi hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir ek hi number add hai koi dusra number add karana chahte hain aap agar kuch nahi aap yahi rehne dijiye.
Customer: Nahi aap yahi rehne dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai to main yahi rehne deti hu aur main aapko na whatsapp pe share kar rahi hu kuch by lead theek hai quantity quantity share kariyega.
Customer: Quantity quantity share kariyega.
Executive: Ha bilkul sir trade.indiamart.com aapne suna hoga hamari jo website hai main waha se aapko share karungi by lead uthakar aap waha se hi wo consume karna aur sir agar consume na hui na to uske liye wo aapko mail mail ki vajah se hi login login dikhayega isliye wo consume nahi hogi dikkat aa sakti hai mail change hone me kyuki time hai do se teen din ka aur ticket open hai ticket mere ko close karna hai aaj hi to aap mail ko se do teen delete kar loge main ticket close kar dungi then aapka mail id change ho jayega yaha pe isme ek video ka option bhi tha mere pass to wo kaise karenge.
Executive: Video add kar sakte ho aap video ka link mere ko share kar do main add kar dungi apni side se ek sample lete hain sir ek video meet ka demo le lete hain main aapko bata bhi dungi dekho aapki mail id pe aaya aapki mail id jo abhi registered hai na India mart me pe aaya hai video ke liye aap ek bar join kar lo main do se teen cheeze dikha deti hu video meet pe kaise karna hota hai video wala option.
Customer: Main abhi immediate nahi kar sakta thoda sa busy hu.
Executive: Kis time tak kar sakte hain aap ye bata dijiye after 12 after 12 1 baje laga lijiye 1 pm got it main pura 1 baje ka schedule karke rakh deti hu sir hai na ha ha ji theek hai thank you theek hai sir thank you very much sir thank you.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting enough sales from buyleads.

- Quantity of leads is not as expected.

- Does not deal in small quantities.

- Wants to change email ID.

- Quantity of leads is not as expected.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to send more buyleads.

- Agreed to not send leads with gram quantities.

- Agreed to change the customer's email ID.

- Executive shared buyleads on WhatsApp.

- Scheduled a video meet to explain video option.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will join a video meet at 1 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, quantity, email id, video meet, product mapping
